lead_paragraph: The Juilliard School found an ideal finale to its Focus! festival in Aaron Copland’s second opera, “The Tender Land.”
snippet: The Juilliard School found an ideal finale to its Focus! festival in Aaron Copland’s second opera, “The Tender Land.”

headline.main: Copland’s Folksy Melodies and the Timeless Theme of Youthful Yearning
headline.seo: Copland at Juilliard: Timeless Teen Yearning
headline.print_headline: Copland’s Folksy Melodies and the Timeless Theme of Youthful Yearning
